newsitem.title: ESTONIA: EMV FIVE MONTHS PROFIT 7.8 MLN KROONS.
newsitem.headline: EMV FIVE MONTHS PROFIT 7.8 MLN KROONS.

text.p: Estonian construction company EMV said on Thursday that its five months unconsolidated profit was 7.8 million kroons and its turnover 118 million kroons.
EMV forecasts its consolidated 1997 profit will be 22 million kroons and turnover 480 million kroons, it added in a statement.
The unconsolidated 1997 profit estimate is 20 million kroons and the turnover forecast 420 million kroons.
The company had signed construction agreements worth 500 million kroons over five months. The construction capacity of 1997 is 327 million kroons.
Its German subsidiary, EMV System-Bau GmbH, has successfully started the construction of one-family houses in Germany.
